steps.title: the page "Home" should be loaded on log on
I expand "Competitive intelligence" Accordion in Home Page
I click on "Broker research" link under "Competitive Intelligence" Accordion on homepage
I click 'Show all filters' link under the filters menu 'Contributor' on the Search Results page
the modal form 'Show all filters' should be displayed on Search Results page

substeps.message: The look up button is displayed

steps.title: I check whether 'Look Up' button is displayed
the tab "Contributor" should be selected in the modal form 'Show all filters' on the Search Results page
I perform look up search by term "SMBC Nikko Securities Inc" on pop-up 'Show all filters'
